description: a(1) = 1; to form a(n+1), append a(n)-1, a(n)+1 at the beginning and the end of a(n), respectively. Ignore any leading 0's.
example: To form the third term from the second term 12, append 11, 13 to the beginning and end of 12, respectively, to get 111213.
author: _Joseph L. Pe_, Feb 09 2002
